Text.Page:
I've come to provide financial support. If you'll lend me your ear...

Rockstalker basilisks roam this region. They're fierce, hideous creatures. However, their scales fetch a handsome price.

How 'bout we make a deal? Get me some of those scales and I'll donate half the take to the garrison.
It was a pleasure doing business with you. I'm sure your armory will benefit greatly from the extra coin.
You don't have the scales yet? I'll just be waiting here...partner.
